issue.title: Problem with 3D-Lidar in Headless mode in VirtualBox

content.raw: A year ago we tried cpu\_ray out of necessity but the results were significantly different from gpu\_ray. After that experience we just got computers with nvidia gpus in order to have one less thing to worry about \(since there are enough others to deal with\).
content.html: A year ago we tried cpu_ray out of necessity but the results were significantly different from gpu_ray. After that experience we just got computers with nvidia gpus in order to have one less thing to worry about (since there are enough others to deal with).
